fixed price.translation[0].definitions[0: a price that is definite and that cannot be reduced or increased
Over the first five years of the contract, most of the gas will be sold at a fixed price.
fixed price.translation[0].definitions[1: an official price for a product or service, set by a government. When the amount has been set, it is illegal to sell the item above this price
The taxis charge a fixed price and are regulated by the city government.
